xs.$description: Extra small displays, usually phones in portrait mode

sm.$description: Small displays, usually tablets in portrait mode or large phones in landscape mode

md.$description: Medium displays, usually tablets in landscape mode

lg.$description: Displays with HD min resolution (1280x720), usually small laptops or large tablets in landscape mode

xl.$description: Displays with a min resolution between HD (1280p) and Full HD (1920p)

2xl.$description: Displays with FHD (Full HD) min resolution (1920x1080)

3xl.$description: Displays with QHD (Quad HD) min resolution (2560x1440)
